reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 109/01: TIME LIMIT UNDER CLAUSE 2 (3.2) (D) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TIME LIMIT UNDER CLAUSE 2 (3.2) (d) OF THE ACT

reg_info.act_under: Assessment Act   Loi sur l’évaluation foncière

content.content: 1. The time limit set out in clause 2 (3.2) (d) of the Act is extended to May 31, 2001. O. Reg. 109/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The time limit set out in clause 2 (3.2) (d) of the Act is extended to May 31, 2001. O. Reg. 109/01, s. 1.
